titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the need to eliminate price-gouging in the transportation of food assistance to Russia.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6879)
Referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 5/28/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that, with respect to food assistance provided by the U.S. Government to Russia, the President should immediately exercise the temporary waiver authority of the cargo preference requirement of the Merchant Marine Act of 1936 and permit Federal agencies to accept only bids that are competitive on the world market.
